root.name: Tecmo World Cup '93
root.description: Tecmo world cup 93 was designed and released for the sega master system, with its simple but stylish graphics it soon gathered a strong following with many devoted fans. There were 16 teams in all with 8 colour strips to choose from as it helped cut down on the memory so it could fit onto the cartridge. There were game modes which include world cup, exhibition and 2player in which you could compete against a friend.
